elements.name: TMS_825_01 Test that Admin could be able to click on search box and enter text.

I click on search box
it should be clicked
I enter text into search bar.
text should be entered

elements.name: TMS_825_02 Test that Admin could be able to search for a trainer by typing in search box and calendar results update in real-time.

steps.name: Admin is navigated to calendar page
I click on search box
it should be clicked
I enter the first two letters of a name of a trainer in the search box - "Br"
Multiple results should populate in the search box with names starting with "Br-"
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/Sprint_4/Admins/TMS_699/" as "TMS_825_02"

elements.name: TMS_825_03 Test that Admin could be able to search for a trainer and when at least 3 results populate in search box, a scroll bar appears within search box to allow scrolling through results.

steps.name: Admin is navigated to calendar page
I click on search box
it should be clicked
I enter the first two letters of a name of a trainer in the search box - "Br"
Multiple results should populate in the search box with names starting with "Br-"
verify scroll bar should appear next to search box, which allows scrolling of results, when at least 3 results populate.
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/Sprint_4/Admins/TMS_699/" as "TMS_825_03"

elements.name: TMS_825_04 Test that Admin could be able to search for a trainer and when results are found, the number of results is shown above the search bar.

steps.name: Admin is navigated to calendar page
I click on search box
it should be clicked
I enter letter "A"
verify "0 results" is displayed above the search box.
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/Sprint_4/Admins/TMS_699/" as "TMS_825_04"

elements.name: TMS_825_05 Test that Admin could be able to search for a trainer, then click on the name in the dropdown box to select the trainer to be displayed.

steps.name: Admin is navigated to calendar page
I click on search box
it should be clicked
I enter the first two letters of a name of a trainer in the search box - "Br"
Multiple results should populate in the search box with names starting with "Br-"
I click on the name "Bruce Wayne" from the results dropdown that should be clickable
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/Sprint_4/Admins/TMS_699/" as "TMS_825_05"

elements.name: TMS_825_06 Test that Admin could be able to type a single letter into search box and the search returns the results of all trainers whose first names start with that letter.

steps.name: Admin is navigated to calendar page
I click on search box
it should be clicked
I enter the first letters of a name of a trainer in the search box - "B"
Only trainers whose first names start with the letter "B" should display on calendar view
Take a screenshot and saving it in "src/test/resources/Screenshots/Sprint_4/Admins/TMS_699/" as "TMS_825_06"
